title: Teams we're IN and OUT on plus Mailbag Monday ðŸ“¬  (Football 6/15)
description:
It's back-to-back appearances for NFL Media's Marc Sessler on the Pick Six podcast. On this Monday episode, Marc and host Will Brinson detail teams they are in (2:30) and out (14:00) on in 2020, plus Quentin Tarantino movie rankings (20:00) and quarantine mistakes. Then, Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson and Sean Wagner-McGough to answer questions for our weekly mailbag (31:30). The guys chat RB compensation, David Carr hypotheticals, Will's marriage and more!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @MarcSessler, @ryanwilsonCBS, @seanjwagner
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7ZUfHFsuQcW7BkTHnXJtqw?view_as=subscriber
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visitÂ https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visitÂ https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
